name: Lands of Lore: Guardians of Destiny
name_original: Lands of Lore: Guardians of Destiny
description:
Lands of Lore: Guardians of Destiny is an action-RPG game developed by Westwood Studios. It was originally released in 1997. It was published by Virgin Interactive Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Lands of Lore: Guardians of Destiny on PC.
